reward.name: Charm of Argonnessen
entries: While you have this Charm, you know {@language Draconic|XPHB}. You can expend the Charm to cast {@spell Dragon's Breath|XPHB} (level 4 version), targeting yourself only.

reward.name: Charm of Ashtakala
entries: While you have this Charm, you know {@language Abyssal|XPHB} and {@language Infernal|XPHB}. You can expend the Charm to cast {@spell Ray of Sickness|XPHB} (level 4 version).

reward.name: Charm of Dhakaan
entries: While you have this Charm, you know the {@language Goblin|XPHB} language. You can expend the Charm to cast {@spell Staggering Smite|XPHB}.

reward.name: Charm of Khyber
entries: While you have this Charm, you have {@sense Darkvision|XPHB} with a range of 120 feet. You can expend the Charm to gain {@sense Truesight|XPHB} with a range of 60 feet for 1 minute.

reward.name: Charm of Xen'drik
entries: While you have this Charm, you know the {@language Giant|XPHB} language. As a Bonus Action, you can expend the Charm to change your Strength score to 25 for 1 hour.

reward.name: Manifest Charm of Daanvi, the Perfect Order
entries: You can expend the Charm (no action required) to end the {@condition Blinded|XPHB}, {@condition Deafened|XPHB}, {@condition Paralyzed|XPHB}, or {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition on yourself.

reward.name: Manifest Charm of Dolurrh, the Realm of the Dead
entries: When you use a spell slot to cast a spell from the Necromancy school, you can expend the Charm (no action required) to treat the spell as if it were cast using a spell slot 1 level above the slot expended.

reward.name: Manifest Charm of Fernia, the Sea of Fire
entries: When you use a spell slot to cast a spell that deals Fire damage, you can expend the Charm (no action required) to treat the spell as if it were cast using a spell slot 1 level above the slot expended.

reward.name: Manifest Charm of Irian, the Eternal Dawn
entries: When you use a spell slot to cast a spell that restores Hit Points or deals Radiant damage, you can expend the Charm (no action required) to treat the spell as if it were cast using a spell slot 1 level above the slot expended.

reward.name: Manifest Charm of Lamannia, the Twilight Forest
entries: When you use a spell slot to cast a spell that conjures or summons a Beast, an Elemental, or a Fey (including {@spell Conjure Animals|XPHB}, {@spell Conjure Elemental|XPHB}, {@spell Conjure Fey|XPHB}, {@spell Conjure Minor Elementals|XPHB}, {@spell Conjure Woodland Beings|XPHB}, {@spell Find Steed|XPHB}, {@spell Summon Beast|XPHB}, {@spell Summon Elemental|XPHB}, or {@spell Summon Fey|XPHB}), you can expend the Charm (no action required) to treat the spell as if it were cast using a spell slot 1 level above the slot expended.

reward.name: Manifest Charm of Mabar, the Endless Night
entries: When you use a spell slot to cast a spell that animates or summons an Undead (including {@spell Animate Dead|XPHB}, {@spell Create Undead|XPHB}, or {@spell Summon Undead|XPHB}), you can expend the Charm (no action required) to treat the spell as if it were cast using a spell slot 1 level above the slot expended.

reward.name: Manifest Charm of Risia, the Plain of Ice
entries: When you use a spell slot to cast a spell that deals Cold damage, you can expend the Charm (no action required) to treat the spell as if it were cast using a spell slot 1 level above the slot expended.

reward.name: Manifest Charm of Shavarath, the Battleground
entries: When you score a Critical Hit, you can expend the Charm (no action required) to deal an extra 10 damage of one of the types dealt by the attack.

reward.name: Manifest Charm of Syrania, the Azure Sky
entries: You can expend the Charm as a Bonus Action to gain a Fly Speed equal to your Speed for 1 minute.

reward.name: Manifest Charm of Thelanis, the Faerie Court
entries: When you cast a spell from the Enchantment or Illusion school, you can expend the Charm (no action required) to give one target of the spell Disadvantage on its saving throw against the spell.

reward.name: Manifest Charm of Xoriat, the Realm of Delirium
entries: When you use a spell slot to cast a spell, you can expend the Charm (no action required) to roll on the {@table Wild Magic Surge|XPHB|Wild Magic Surge table} in the {@book Player's Handbook|XPHB}.
